pageContext.claim: “Courts & Dems in Congress, neither of which have a clue, are trying to FORCE migrants into our Country! OUR COUNTRY IS FULL, OUR DETENTION CENTERS, HOSPITALS & SCHOOLS ARE PACKED. Crazy!”
pageContext.analysis: Increased violence in Central America has led to a spike in migration -- not the courts or the Democrats in Congress. The immigration system is overloaded, but it’s misleading to say “the country is full.” In many parts of the country, the aging population and declining birth rate have left “underpopulated cities and towns,” according to a New York Times report.
